Posts.Content: Lano wrote: My next decision is whether to get a port to receive the chemo drugs or get the IV on top of my hand....they say that I do have "good" veins but is there a danger of collaspe?  Has anyone had problems with their port???  My oncologist has given me the choice of adding adriamycin to taxotere and cytaxan.....the nurses and patients call adriamycin the Red Devil....the short term and possible long term effects are very scarey. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Is a port better for chemo or IV in hand??? Lano Texgirl
